passive.name: SECOND SKIN
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) SECOND SKIN
                                Living Weapon: Kai'Sa's abilities evolve based upon the permanent stats she gains from Items and Levels.Caustic Wounds: Kai'sa's attacks and allies immobilizing effects stack Plasma for 4 seconds and deal 5 bonus magic damage (5 (+0,5 ) + 15% ). Plasma detonates at 5 stacks, dealing bonus magic damage equal to 15% (15% + 0.025% ) of their missing Health.Plasma detonation deal a max of 400 damage to monsters.

q.name: (Q) ICATHIAN RAIN
q.description:
(Q) ICATHIAN RAIN
 9/8/7/6s   55 
                                
                                
                                Launches 6 missiles that split evenly among nearby enemies, each dealing 40 physical damage (40/60/80/100 + 50% bonus  + 30% ). Additional hits on champions or monsters deal 25% damage.Living Weapon: 70 Attack Damage (current: 0) - Fires 12 missiles.Minions below 35% Health take 150% damage.

w.name: (W) VOID SEEKER
w.description:
(W) VOID SEEKER
 20/18/16/14s   60/65/70/75 
                                
                                
                                Fires a blast that reveals the first enemy hit, adds 2 Plasma stacks, and deals 99 magic damage (30/60/90/120 + 110%  + 60% ).Living Weapon: 80 Ability Power (current: 0) - Adds 3 stacks and refunds 70% Cooldown on champion hits.

e.name: (E) SUPERCHARGE
e.description:
(E) SUPERCHARGE
 16/14/12/10s   30 
                                
                                
                                Charges up for 1 seconds, gaining 60% Movement Speed (50/55/60/65% + 80% ). For 4 seconds after charging, gain 40/50/60/70% Attack Speed.Living Weapon: 65% Attack Speed (current: 0%) - Grants invisibility during the charge up.Attacks reduce Supercharge's Cooldown by 0.5 seconds.Charge time and Movement Speed scale with Attack Speed.

r.name: (R) KILLER INSTINCT
r.description:
(R) KILLER INSTINCT
 80/70/60s   100 
                                
                                
                                Dash to a location near an enemy champion marked by Plasma, gaining a shield that absorbs 133 damage (75/100/125 + 100%  + 75% ) for 2 seconds.
